card.name: Norman Osborn
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

alternate.name: Green Goblin
alternate.property: When Revealed: Deal 3 indirect damage to each player in hero form.

card.name: Norman Osborn
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

alternate.name: Green Goblin
alternate.property: When Revealed: Deal 3 indirect damage to each player.

card.name: Norman Osborn
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Norman Osborn would take any amount of damage, remove that many infamy counters from Criminal Enterprise instead.

alternate.name: Green Goblin
alternate.property: When Revealed: Deal 4 indirect damage to each player.

card.name: Hostile Takeover
card.property: Contents: Norman Osborn (I) and Norman Osborn (II). (Norman Osborn (II) and Norman Osborn (III) instead for expert mode.) Risky Business and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Goblin Gimmicks). Setup: Put the Criminal Enterprise environment into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

alternate.name: Hostile Takeover
alternate.property: When Completed: Place 1[per_hero] infamy counters on Criminal Enterpise. Then discard 1 card from each player's deck for each infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise.
Norman Osborn holds a board meeting planning to take over a branch of Stark Industries.

card.name: Corporate Acquisition
card.property: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B.
With a branch of Stark Industries under his control, Norman Osborn will gain access to deadly technologies and quadruple the manufacturing capabilities of Oscorp.

alternate.name: Corporate Acquisition
alternate.property: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
If Norman Osborn succeeds, nothing will stand in the way of his technological domination.

card.name: Criminal Enterprise
card.property: Criminal Enterprise enter play with 2[per_hero] infamy counters on it. If there are no infamy counters here, flip Norman Osborn and Criminal Enterprise.
"Business. Is. Good."

alternate.name: State of Madness
alternate.property: State of Madness enter play with 2[per_hero] madness counters on it. If there are no madness counters here, flip Green Goblin and State of Madness.
"Fool! Your power is nothing compared to mine! Your strength is nothing, your intellect is NOTHING!" -- Green Goblin

card.name: Hired Gun
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either give the villain 1 facedown boost card or place 2 infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise.

card.name: Private Security Specialist
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Oscorp Manufacturing
card.property: When Revealed (Norman Osborn): Place an additional 1[per_hero] threat here.
Despite objections from shareholders, Oscorp now exclusively produces military-grade weaponry.

card.name: Payoff
card.property: Despite objections from shareholders, Oscorp now exclusively produces military-grade weaponry.

card.name: All in a Day's Work
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 infamy counters on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 2 madness counters from State of Madness.

card.name: Mad Genius
card.property: When Revealed (Green Goblin): Green Goblin attacks the hero with the fewest hit points remaining. If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Norman Osborn): Discard the top card of your deck for each infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise.

card.name: Green Goblin
card.property: "Did you expect the Green Goblin to let you live?!"

card.name: Green Goblin
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 2 encounter cards to each player.

card.name: Green Goblin
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 3 encounter cards to each player.

card.name: Unleasing the Mutagen
card.property: Contents: Green Goblin (I) and Green Goblin (II). (Green Goblin(II) and Green Goblin (III) instead for expert mode.) Mutagen Formula and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Goblin Gimmicks). Setup: Put a Goblin Thrall minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

alternate.name: Unleashing the Mutagen
alternate.property: When Completed: In player order, each player not engaged with a [[Goblin]] minion must discard 3 cards from the encounter deck and put the first [[Goblin]] minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.
Green Goblin has released a toxic mutagen gas on New York City.

card.name: Mutagen Cloud
card.property: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B
As the cloud engulfs the city, those unfortunate enough to be caught in the vapors begin to shiver and shift, mutating into hideous goblin creatures.

alternate.name: Mutagen Cloud
alternate.property: X is equal to the number of [[Goblin]] enemies (including Green Goblin) in play. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
The goblin creatures serve Green Goblin's every command. Stop Green Goblin before his monstrous militia overruns the city!

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Goblin Glider attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [energy] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Hysteria
card.property: Hero Action: Spend [mental] [mental] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Pumpkin Bombs
card.property: Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Goblin Soldier
card.property: When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to the engaged player.

card.name: Goblin Thrall
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Monster
card.property: When Revealed: You are stunned. If you are already stunned, take 2 damage.

card.name: Goblin Reinforcements
card.property: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each [[Goblin]] minion in play.
Using the mutagen formula and advanced combat training, Green Goblin has created an elite force of goblin commandos.

card.name: Goblin Nation
card.property: Each [[Goblin]] enemy (including Green Goblin) gets +1 ATK.
"We are not a gang. We are so much more. We're family. An empire! A pantheon! And I? I am the Goblin King!" -- Green Goblin

card.name: Overrun
card.property: When Defeated: In player order, each player must discard 2 cards from the encounter deck and put each [[Goblin]] minion they discarded this way into play engaged with them.

card.name: Death from Above
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Green Goblin schemes with +X SCH, where X is equal to the villain's stage number. When Revealed (Hero): Green Goblin attacks with +X ATK, where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

card.name: I See You
card.property: When Revealed: Green Goblin attack you. If you are in alter-ego form, do not give the villain a boost card for this activation.

card.name: Overconfidence
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Green Goblin schemes. If at least 3 threat was placed by this activation, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Green Goblin attacks you. If at least 3 damage was placed by this activation, this card gains surge.

card.name: Wicked Ambitions
card.property: When Revealed: Discard X cards from the encounter deck, where X is equal to double the villain's stage number. Each time a [[Goblin]] minion is discarded this way, choose to either take 3 damage or put that minion into play engaged with you.

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Goblin Glider attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [energy] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Pumpkin Bombs
card.property: Attach to the villain. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Intimidation
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either spend 2 resources of any type or give the villain 1 facedown boost card.

card.name: Regenerative Healing
card.property: When Revealed: The villain heals X damage, where X is equal to double the villain's stage number. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: A Mess of Things
card.property: Scorpion tears through the business district, causing as much mayhem as possible.

card.name: Scorpion
card.property: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks you.)

card.name: Gang-Up
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): The villain and each minion engaged with you attacks you.

card.name: Tail Sweep
card.property: When Revealed: Scorpion attacks your hero. If no attack was made this way, you are stunned.

card.name: Power Drain
card.property: When Defeated: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player must choose and discard 1 resource of any type from their hand for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.name: Electromagnetic Pulse
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 7 cards from the encounter deck. If Electro was discarded this way, put him into play engaged with you. If Electro was not discarded this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.name: Shock Therapy
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the encounter deck. The villain heals 1 damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.name: Running Interference
card.property: When Revealed: Each player must choose to either spend [mental] [physical] resources or place 2 threat here.

card.name: All Tied Up
card.property: Attach to your identity card. Attached character cannot ready or change form. Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Media Coverage
card.property: Attach to your identity card. Resolve each "When Revealed" ability that you reveal 1 additional time. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [mental] resource â†’ discard this card.
